description: The results of a single item on a user's download list.

addedOn.description: The date-time when this file was added to the user's download list.

projectId.description: The ID of the project that contains this file.

projectName.description: The name of the project that contains this file.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this file.

createdOn.description: The date-time when this file was created.

fileSizeBytes.description: The size of the file in bytes.
